knimeNode.name: Sentence Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts all sentences of a document as string.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts all sentences a document consists of and returns a data table of documents, the corresponding sentences as string column and the number of terms contained in a sentences as int column.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains document and sentences columns.
